text: is the fourth album by Japanese idol girl group Nogizaka46. It was released on 17 April 2019. The album reached the top position on the weekly Oricon Albums Chart, with 446,618 copies sold. It also reached number one on the Billboard Japan Hot Albums and Top Albums Sales charts. == Release == This album was released in 4 versions: Type-A, Type-B, first press limited edition, and a regular edition. ==Track listing== All lyrics written by Yasushi Akimoto. === Type-A === === Type-B === === First press limited edition === === Regular edition === ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row"|Japan (Billboard Japan Hot Albums) |1 |- !scope="row"|Japan (Billboard Japan Top Albums Sales) |1 |- !scope="row"|Japan (Oricon Albums Chart) |1 |} ==Sales== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" !Country !Chart !Sales |- | Japan | Oricon Albums Chart | 511,000 |} ==References== Category:Nogizaka46 albums Category:Japanese-language albums Category:2019 albums
title: Ima ga Omoide ni Naru made
